title: Shouldn't there be a musical skin for Thresh?
body: After all, he collects so much Soul.

replies.body: My first thought was Thresh singing in the rain, when the clear and obvious choice should have been Pentakill Thresh.  Oh brain, you are odd.
I was more so thinking of something akin to Popstar Ahri except themed around soul music.
Keeping it Funky Thresh.
Thunky Thresh
Them music symbol souls OP.
Jazzy Thresh
I was thinking more Sweet Jazz Thresh with a saxophone instead of his hook and a drum in place of his lantern.
Wouldn't that A Clockwork Orange reference be a little too dark?
{{champion:412}}  Hello, from the other siiiiiiide. I threw my lantern a thousand tiiiimes. But you scrubs won't grab it because you think you can 1v5 the enemy teaaaam! {{champion:412}}
**INTRODUCING NEW PENTAKILL BAND MEMBER THRESH ON...... THE ALTO SAXOPHONE!**

> [{quoted}](name=H4nyuu,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hg3Usn6e,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-06T16:38:19.617+0000)
>
> **INTRODUCING NEW PENTAKILL BAND MEMBER THRESH ON...... THE ALTO SAXOPHONE!**

**AND HIS BACKUP SINGERS, THE "PLEASE RELEASE OUR SOULS!" CHORUS!**
**"Adding ska-punk to a metal band like 'Pentakill' was a bold move but the sax solos totally shred!" SAID LONG TIME FAN OF PENTAKILL DAVID (PHREAK) ThoweveryouspellhislastnameLY**

Let It Go for Thresh. Because of you, I will think of this anytime I will play Thresh and he's my main. XDDD

lol glad you agree XD
just noticed what your name was. glad you commented again because I can't upvote a single post twice. :(

prince of bot lane thresh confirmed?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2C4XB0sFBc
Nah, he seems to be a rapper, call him 2Chainz
The soothing vocals of Thresh Brown, the godfather of soul, will always be a classic.
wouldnt 2chainz be a leblanc skin tho?
His Q could be a saxophone that just keeps getting longer and longer.
Still need Sax Jax.
Sex Jax you say? nah that's rule34's job.
i had no clue there was this rule, not surprised tough
"Let me in em'!"
I was thinking Death metal because screaming is music to his ears.
That was terrible. Please uninstall.
Krampus

i expected to see a thrash metal joke

but still +1
Harmonic Thresh, He's got Those Soul-harvestin' Blues
Funky Thresh
He's got a mean hook.
Just take the upvote and go.

I'm not sure it's time for a thresh skin though,I think lee sin needs one first.

But after that,sure.
